message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to negotiate a lower price. How about $120?
I understand you're looking to negotiate a lower price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would you consider $130 for the product?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob. But I still need to make a decent profit. How about $137.50?
Hello Alice, I'm willing to pay up to $135 for the product. Would you be able to meet me at this price?
I think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can do $138, but that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, considering the negotiations so far, I'm willing to pay $136 for the product. Could we reach an agreement at this price?
I've given you a good deal, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $140. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I really appreciate your efforts, but based on my budget, I can only commit to $137 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
